document.full_text: more than 5,000 czechs have signed up to a facebook campaign to mail pens to president vaclav klaus after a video of him sheepishly pocketing a pen during an official signing ceremony in chile became widely popular on the internet.
document.title: europe: czech republic: president to save a fortune on office supplies
lines_and_colors: more than 5,000 czechs have signed up to a facebook campaign to mail pens to president vaclav klaus after a video of him sheepishly pocketing a pen during an official signing ceremony in chile became widely popular on the internet.
